post.summary: Endpoint for getting JWT access token

get.summary: Endpoint for getting list of orders based on request
Returns product pages based on parameters

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Limit how many products to return

parameters.name: WithVariants
parameters.description: If true variants are loaded too for products with variants (default false)

parameters.name: WithLongDescription
parameters.description: If true, DocumentSKUDescription is filled too (default false)

parameters.name: NoLinks
parameters.description: If true, only not-linked product pages are returned (default false)

get.summary: Returns all product categories translated for given culture
Returns prices for product and it's variant when productSkuId is main product or only variant prices when ID is for variant
Returns prices for list of products
Returns inventory and price for given product/variant
Returns current cart content for cart preview or cart content step
Returns current cart details for cart delivery details step
Returns current customer assigned to current cart

put.summary: Set all delivery details (customer, addreses, shipping and payment)

get.summary: Returns all shopping cart data (content and details)

put.summary: Set currency to cart when currency is different than previous

BooleanShoppingCartResponse.description: Shopping cart API response with model

KCulture.description: Represents language culture for Store site

KCustomerShoppingCartResponse.description: Shopping cart API response with model

KProductCatalogPrices.description: Represents product catalog prices from catalog price calculator

KProductCategory.description: Represents products section (category) - Page type which has ClassIsProductSection true

customFields.description: Contains custom field values on given page type

mainImageUrl.description: Overwrite this property when product image is saved differently

KShoppingCartDeliveryDetails.description: Model representing shopping cart delivery details

KShoppingCartDetails.description: Model representing all shopping cart details

KShoppingCartItemShoppingCartResponse.description: Shopping cart API response with model

KShoppingCartItemValidationErrorIEnumera.description: Shopping cart API response with model

KShoppingCartSummary.description: Model encapsulating all shopping cart data (content with details)

name.description: Summary item name used for displaying in Invoice, Email template and Shopping cart.

value.description: Summary item value in shopping cart currency used for displaying in Invoice, Email template and Shopping cart.

ProductInventoryPriceInfo.description: Model for product/variant inventory and price

ProductPricesResponse.description: Prices for product and it's variants

ShoppingCartBaseResponse.description: Base shopping cart response for Store API
